summary: A Snow Elf Race for you to play as :)
descriptionHtml:
[DAWNGUARD NOT REQUIRED!!] :D

Readme:
Just copy the SnowElf.esp to the /data folder of your skyrim and you\'re good to go!

Changes:
Removed Special Frost Atronach Spell
Added Summon Betrayed power, allows you to summon falmer for 2 mins once per day
Made less overpowerd generally

Not as white as the snow elves in dawnguard but it does the job.
Has a summon betrayed power, witch lets you summon a falmer to fight for you for up to 2 minutes once a day (this works as any other power, press shout key) Also has a snow shield power and 65% resist frost 50% vulnerable to fire, 25% disease resistance etc. Also comes with ice spike + Frostbite destruction spells.

Skills:

+10 Light armor
+10 Destruction
+5 One Handed
+5 Restoration
+5 Conjuration
Total: 35
author: SONNYSPAK
